mapper.select:
select FName, FNumber, FAddress, FContact, FPhone, FRegDate, FCity, FEmail, CONVERT(BIGINT, FModifyTime) as FModifyTime from t_Organization where 1 = 1
And CONVERT(BIGINT, FModifyTime) > #{max}

SELECT A.FNumber AS 'number', A.FName AS 'name', IsNull( C.FName, '' ) AS 'type', IsNull( B.FName, '' ) AS 'client', A.F_102 AS 'describe', A.F_103 AS 'clientId', A.F_104 AS 'QGP', ISNULL( B.FNumber, 0 ) AS 'custNo', CONVERT(BIGINT, A.FModifyTime) AS 'FModifyTime' FROM t_Item_3008 A LEFT JOIN t_Organization B ON B.FItemID= A.F_103 LEFT JOIN t_SubMessage C ON C.FInterID= A.F_106 WHERE C.FName = '整机'
AND CONVERT(BIGINT, A.FModifyTime) > #{max}

select i.FName as 'iName', i.FNumber as 'iNumber', i.FModel as 'iModel', u.FName as 'uName', s.FName as 'sName', i.FKFPeriod as 'iKFPeriod', CONVERT(BIGINT, i.FModifyTime) as 'FModifyTime' from t_ICItem i left join t_MeasureUnit u on u.FItemID = i.FCUUnitID left join t_StockPlace s on s.FSPID = i.FSPID where 1 = 1
And CONVERT(BIGINT, i.FModifyTime) > #{max}

SELECT item.FNumber as 'FNumber', item.FName as 'FName', item.FModel as 'FModel', unit.FName as 'UFName', stock.FName as 'SFName', inven.FBatchNo as 'FBatchNo', inven.FQty as 'FQty' FROM ICInventory inven LEFT JOIN t_ICItem item ON item.FItemID = inven.FItemID LEFT JOIN t_MeasureUnit unit ON unit.FItemID = item.FCUUnitID LEFT JOIN t_Stock stock ON stock.FItemID = inven.FStockID WHERE 1 = 1
and item.FNumber = #{num}
